text: Inc. is an international American business magazine. The magazine publishes six issues every year. The magazine also does a few live and virtual events yearly. Inc. is best known for ranking the fastest-growing privately held companies in the United States, which they call the "Inc. 500" and "Inc. 5000." == International editions == Apart from inc.com, the magazine runs local editions, including: *Inc. India *Inc. Australia == Other websites == * Official website * "Inc 500 Fastest Growing Companies in America List" * "The Stealthy Sales Kings of Amazon" == References == Category:1979 establishments in the United States Category:Magazines published in New York City
title: Inc. (magazine)
